title: Usage of AI Systems
text:
Welcome to the AlgoSoc Survey Dashboard
    This dashboard aggregates data collected via the AlgoSoc Consortium to show how citizens think and feel about AI in society.
    If you want to know more about AlgoSoc and our work on AI, visit us on algosoc.org!
  










Usage of AI Systems

How often in the past year did you useâ€¦


Overall By Age By Gender By Education By Politics
















































Ability to Detect AI-Generated Content

How confident are you that the following groups can tell the difference between content created by AI and content created by people?


Overall By Age By Gender By Education By Politics
















































Familiarity with AI terms

How familiar are you with the following terms?


Overall By Age By Gender By Education By Politics

title: AlgoSoc Survey

1 LU    2024-03-05 last_30_days



Methodology
In collaboration with Who Targets Me, we monitored 904 political advertisers to better understand how campaigns use different targeting methods made available by Meta. To do this, we used data from the Meta Ad Library, using the new â€˜Audienceâ€™ data which gives some detail on how pages target their ads.
To better understand the election, we kept only advertisers who:

Advertised in the last 7 days (27 Feb - 4 Mar 2024)
Advertised in the last 30 days (4 Feb - 4 Mar 2024)







Note



Meta only provides 7, 30 and 90 days windows for the targeting data in their Ad Library. Metaâ€™s data also lags by a few days. Report will be updated as soon as new data is available.








Disclaimer



The data shown in this dashboard is based on the platformâ€™s respective ad libraries which are known to be sometimes incomplete (Edelson et al.Â 2020; Silva et al.Â 2020). For this reason the data shown here might not reflect the full picture nor all political ads that were targeted at voters.




About the Creator of the Dashboard











Fabio Votta is a Postdoc at the University of Amsterdam who studies (online) political microtargeting and its usage around the world.











Want to see how political parties target you? Sign up at Who Targets Me and download the gratis browser plugin to see how parties on Facebook use your data:
https://whotargets.me/







Want to retrieve targeting data from the Facebook Ad Library yourself? This dashboard is powered by the R package: metatargetr. Check it out here:
https://github.com/favstats/metatargetr
